typeLines.text: Long, long ago, there walked many bipedal beings of remarkable intellect, called humans.
They had food, shelter, and companions. A life of plenty brought them a feeling of joy called happiness.
Whenever humans felt happiness from the depths of their hearts, the seed of a Key-Spirit quietly took root within.
We grew by drawing on their positive feelings—the happier they were, the faster we grew.
But as the ages changed, human feelings grew more and more "faint."
"Faint" meant two things: life turned plain, and the taste of joy we sipped became faint as well.
Study, work, and daily life—these, in their words, became more important than happiness.
In the end, they became the fuse for a great calamity.
After that day, the survivors resolved to rebuild a joyful homeland upon the ruins.
And we spirits, with the power to explore hearts, entered humans' inner worlds to find their hidden keys.
You, as the new generation of spirits, must unlock even more hearts.
